page.title: 13Criticisms of Blackridge
page.content: One of the most obvious{criticisms of Blackridge is the{bings.}These have been left from the coal mining days.Before they started to take them away lots of people got{injured because of the hot ash under the gum. They spoil the{landscape.}There are big pools of water down at the bottom and the children can think it is shallow and go in paddling. Another problem about Blackridge is that there is too much vandalism. In Blackridge the phones used to get vandalised frequently but now Blackridge has got new{vandalproof phones. People write their names on walls, roofs, phone boxes and bus shelters.
